name: Versity [OLD]
description: The SITY Token is the reference token for the VERSITY metaverse project. It is intended to be used as an exchange currency for all transactions carried out on the metaverse : • Classified ads for real estate rental or sale • Lead acquisition for real estate professionals • Rental of advertising space • DAO VERSITY Metaverse project has been launched on 2022 by the french company VERSITY, listed on Euronext and aims to creates connections between the virtual and real world, allowing anyone to manage physical or virtual goods, provide services and earn rewards, including by hosting virtual properties and various tangible services.
